pages.text: $(li)The Enchanted Golden Apple is an eatable item when eaten gives you five seconds of $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/regeneration)Renegeration$(/l) II effect, healing your health while this effect is active.

$(li)It gives the $(l)Absorption$() effect, adding to you for two minutes two extra hearts of life or when they are broken by receiving damage.$(br)$(li)It gives five minutes of $(l)Resistance$(), making you receive less damage for any kind of damage and other five minutes of $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/fire_resistance)Fire Resistance$(/l) making your immune to fire damage or burn in lava.
